definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (salvation; on form, cf. [[הַשְׁמֵד]] on pronunciation v. Hpt:ZA ii, 261 Anm. 2 Jager:BAS i, 468)—
orig. name of Joshua acc. to Nu 13:8, Nu 13:16 (P), LXX Aush, cf. De 32:44 (J; prob. err., v. Dr), LXX Ihsouv, v. [[יְהוֹשׁוּעַ]] p. 221 supr.
last king of Israel 2Ki 15:30, 2Ki 17:1, 2Ki 17:3, 2Ki 17:4, 2Ki 17:6, 2Ki 18:1, 2Ki 18:9, 2Ki 18:10, LXX Wshe.
the prophet Hosea Ho 1:1, Ho 1:2, Ho 1:2, LXX Wshe.
an Ephraimite chief under David 1Ch 27:20, LXX Wsh(e).
a chief under Nehemiah Ne 10:24, LXX Wshqa, Wshe.
